languages.text: "Вейся хоть змеей, хоть вьюном, еретическое отродье, с этого корабля ты все равно не сойдешь невредимой!"
"Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."
languages.original_text: "Вейся хоть змеей, хоть вьюном, еретическое отродье, с этого корабля ты все равно не сойдешь невредимой!"

traits.locale_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship scot-free either way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship scot-free either way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “异端的子嗣，就算你再狡猾，也别想毫发无损地离开这艘飞船。”
languages.original_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."

traits.locale_text: “异端的子嗣，就算你再狡猾，也别想毫发无损地离开这艘飞船。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Retuércete cuanto quieras, alimaña herética; no saldrás ilesa de esta nave».
languages.original_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."

traits.locale_text: «Retuércete cuanto quieras, alimaña herética; no saldrás ilesa de esta nave».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous pouvez bien vous démener, misérable hérétique, vous ne quitterez pas ce vaisseau indemne. »
languages.original_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez bien vous démener, misérable hérétique, vous ne quitterez pas ce vaisseau indemne. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Windet Euch ruhig, Ketzerbrut, aber Ihr werdet dieses Schiff niemals unversehrt verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."

traits.locale_text: "Windet Euch ruhig, Ketzerbrut, aber Ihr werdet dieses Schiff niemals unversehrt verlassen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「好きなだけ這っておけ、異端児どもが。だが、無傷でこの船を去ることは決してない」
languages.original_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."

traits.locale_text: 「好きなだけ這っておけ、異端児どもが。だが、無傷でこの船を去ることは決してない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İstediğin kadar sürün kâfir yaratık. Bu gemiden asla sağ salim ayrılamayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Slither all you like, heretic spawn, but you will never leave this ship unscathed."

traits.locale_text: "İstediğin kadar sürün kâfir yaratık. Bu gemiden asla sağ salim ayrılamayacaksın."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
